description: Identifier of the saved query/report these settings belong to. Groups multiple rows into one query configuration.
Sequential position of this field within the query layout and sort configuration; determines evaluation or display order.
Name of the dataset field this configuration targets, such as work order identifiers, item attributes, costs, dates, or amounts.
Numeric code for sort behavior and/or priority on this field (for example, none, ascending, or descending). Exact mapping may vary; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether a subtotal should be produced when grouping by this field.
Indicates descending sort direction for this field (Y/N). May overlap with other sort settings; confirm the authoritative control with SME.
User who created this configuration row.
Timestamp when this row was created, in system time.
User who last modified this configuration row.
Timestamp when this row was last updated.
Code defining grouping behavior for this field (e.g., create a group break, subgroup, or none). Exact code meanings likely vary; confirm with SME.
Code controlling whether and how this field contributes to grand totals or aggregates (e.g., sum, average). Exact values likely vary; confirm with SME.
Data type of the field, used to apply correct sorting, formatting, validation, and aggregation rules.
